duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for patient care within an assigned department/unit and participates as a member of the health care team.
Assesses, analyzes, plans, implements and evaluates patient care following established patient care standards.
Demonstrates positive interpersonal and communication skills with colleagues, patients, families, physicians and the community.
Follows guidelines set forth in Legacy’s Values in Action.

education_certification.credential: BSN or degree in progress strongly preferred.
BSN may be required for specific assignments; experienced RNs without a BSN may be hired based on clinical experience with approval of the site CNO.
